title: Taffy Brodesser-Akner Talks About Her First Novel
description: Brodesser-Akner discusses “Fleishman in Trouble,” and Katherine Eban talks about “Bottle of Lies: The Inside Story of the Generic Drug Boom.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
